entry.title: Auto-Subscribing To Blogs / Feeds Of Links Tweeted, Bookmarked Or Posted

div.p: It shouldn't be so difficult for me to follow a blog or anything else that (somehow) exposes a webfeed or any other kind of feed.

How about if I tweet, bookmark or post something that contains (one or more) link(s), then some system goes and tentatively auto-subscribes (me) to any RSS/Atom feed (or any other kind of feed) it finds associated with the links in said tweet or bookmark.
Then use various explicit and implicit techniques could be used to figure out what to stay subscribed to, and how to organize.
